The gold and iron plates bolted to the back of these gauntlets crackle with energy.

Hands Slot: Uncommon

Power âœ¦ Daily (Free Action)

Use this power when you make a melee attack. Change the damage type dealt by that attack to thunder. On a hit, deal an extra 1d6 thunder damage. Also, deal an extra 1 thunder damage on successful melee attacks until the end of your next turn.

If you've reached at least one milestone today, instead deal an extra 2 thunder damage on successful melee attacks until the end of your next turn.

Level 20: 2d6 thunder damage, extra 3 thunder damage (4 after milestone).

Level 30: 3d6 thunder damage, extra 5 thunder damage (6 after milestone).
